sections.text: Special privileges on immovables and other privilegesIf the immovables of the debtor are subject to vendor's privileges or other special privileges, the vendors and creditors having other special privileges shall be paid from the price of the object affected in their favor, in preference to other privileged debts of the debtor, even funeral charges, except the charges for affixing seals, making inventories, and others which may have been necessary to procure the sale of the thing.Amended by Acts 2019, No. 325, ยง2, eff. Jan. 1, 2020.
